attributes.action: Allow phones in all school across England,especially Outwood Academy Foxills
attributes.additional_details: It would make the students more happier and it would we really fun and it would help students with some education (e.g.e research important information in school). It would also make communication easier and it would help with stress,anxiety by looking on phone or listening to music or speaking to someone when needed. So please let phone in all free phone school across England

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Don't ban mobile phones in school
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646310
